definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: The stakes for high-net-worth dogs continue to rise.
sentences.chinese: 高淨值”名犬的身價越來越高了。

sentences.english: The corporation records the issuance of the bonds at the net amount received from the underwriter .
sentences.chinese: 發行公司只記錄從證券包銷商處收到的現金淨值。

sentences.english: In a normal stage of the market, the Fund net sudden shocks significantly.
sentences.chinese: 在某一個市場正常階段，基金淨值突然大幅度震盪的。

sentences.english: The bottom of the range is close to the company's net asset value.
sentences.chinese: 招股價下限和每股資產淨值相若。

sentences.english: Inventories are stated at the lower of cost and net realisable value.
sentences.chinese: 存貨按成本值與可變現淨值兩者中之較低者入賬。

sentences.english: Inventories are required to be stated at the lower of cost and net realisable value (NRV).
sentences.chinese: 存貨計量應當採用成本和可變現淨值孰低法。

sentences.english: Gross, as opposed to net, is “the rogue word” in Gross Domestic Product, he says.
sentences.chinese: 毛估值與淨值相反，是GDP的“劣詞”，他說。

sentences.english: After all expenses and dividend, this is the final net figure.
sentences.chinese: 扣去了所有的費用和股息，它就是最終的淨值。

sentences.english: Household net worth is assets, such as home equity, minus liabilities, such as mortgage debt.
sentences.chinese: 家庭財產淨值是房產等資產減去抵押貸款等債務。

sentences.english: The receivables, therefore, are not stated at estimated net realizable value.
sentences.chinese: 因此應收款不反映預計的可實現淨值。

sentences.english: Article 18 The items of the net assets shall present the net value of the enterprise annuity fund.
sentences.chinese: 第十八條淨資產類項目列示企業年金基金淨值。

sentences.english: The outlook is bouncier in commodities and for the moment equities .
sentences.chinese: 日用品行業的前景更加不明確了，資產淨值也是如此。

definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
sum or volume of business transactions/turnover
